definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: I'd like a Fillet-o-Fish and an apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个麦香鱼和一个苹果派。

sentences.english: I had a hamburger,some French fries,and apple pie and a Coke.
sentences.chinese: 我吃一个汉堡包，一些薯条，以及苹果派和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Set A has an apple pie and broiled lamb chops.
sentences.chinese: 套餐A有一个苹果派和烤羊羔肉块。

sentences.english: This delicate yellow-green Chardonnay has an aroma reminiscent of toasted bread and hot apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 色泽青黄，香味使人想起烘面包及熟苹果派。

sentences.english: Can I add some cinnamon powder to the apple pie?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在苹果派里加点肉桂粉吗？

sentences.english: Do you like apple pie or chocolate cake?
sentences.chinese: 你想要苹果派还是巧克力蛋糕？

sentences.english: Yes! I want two chocolate sundaes.
sentences.chinese: 要不要来份苹果派或是圣代？

sentences.english: Grandma is famous for her apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶因她的苹果派而出名。

sentences.english: I would like apple-pie and a Coke.
Peel the skin off those apples. I want to make an apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 把那些苹果削皮，我要做个苹果派。

sentences.english: Afterwards the friends arrived one after another and were pleased about the pretty smell of my freshly baked apple-pie.
sentences.chinese: 朋友陆续前来，享受着新鲜烤苹果派的浓浓香味。
